labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The giphy search is stored as seen here: <https://gyazo.com/3d4247cb20183cf52c57703022bfcdcf>
data.expected_result: The giphy search should not be stored
data.short_description: /giphy bug, your previous /giphy search will store when deleted
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on a message box - Type /giphy somethinghere - Press CTRL A to select everything and then delete it - Click out of the box - Click back in the box
